attributes.name: AWS WAF Access Control List Deletion v101.0.2
attributes.description: Identifies the deletion of a specified AWS Web Application Firewall (WAF) access control list.
author: Elastic
false_positives: Firewall ACL's may be deleted by a system or network administrator. Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment. Web ACL deletions by unfamiliar users or hosts should be investigated. If known behavior is causing false positives, it can be exempted from the rule.
attributes.setup: The AWS Fleet integration, Filebeat module, or similarly structured data is required to be compatible with this rule.
